Why is it that every time I jump into a game I canâ€™t move, like Iâ€™m completely immobilized. I canâ€™t do absolutely anything. Not sure if anyone else is experiencing this, but I hope it gets fixed soon because this game breaking.

(played ~150 hours casually of OW1)
Blizzard Mindset be like:
+Lets sell a license to a game for 40â‚¬ with all heroes unlocked,  free cosmetic progression and PvE Events
""Upgrade it to overwatch 2""
-Remove everybodies OW1 License, announce co-op PvE mode with progression and skill tree
-Not have all heroes unlocked - but you can buy them now for real money (which isnt the best for competitive)
-Remove free cosmetic progression - but you can buy them now, either 20â‚¬ per skin (my account would be now woarth 2k+â‚¬, if I would buy everrything that I had again), or through FOMO Seasonal Battlepass System
-Cancel PvE mode in favor of competitive
-Release half baked PvE mode without progression/skill trees, of course as microtransaction DLCs

A brilliant game ruined ruined by abusive monetization practices. 
All cosmetic should be maximum half what they are now, and there is a component of FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out).
Why do i have to pay 40 euros if i just want that new kiriko skin?
You know how many whole games i could buy with 21 euros, instead of a skin and a voiceline for Mei?
But they know we love these characters and cosmetics, they are set on squeezing all of our savings for it.
Fxxk you Blizzard, and a fxxk you to Bobby Kotick!!!
I like the game and have liked it since the launch of Overwatch 1. I don't like the monetization. Don't understand the hate though, as it's free

Stupid Blizzard.
Where's my thousands of hours of gameplay?
Where's my pink angel skin?
Where's my collector's edition game?
Where's my friends list?
Where's my golden weapon?
Where's my youth?

The world doesn't need heroes, and I can't hear the call anymore.

What did you clowns think was going to happen when you decided to destroy this game from the ground up in the most anti-consumer way ever witnessed in gaming history, straight up LIE about a PVE campaign, monetize the game in the most insidious way possible, absolutely decimate the balancing of the game with awful changes to pre-existing heroes and adding TERRIBLE concepts for new ones that should NEVER have left the board room, and then make the galaxy brain decision to move what's left of the dumpster fire to a platform where your disgruntled playerbase and the playerbase of your biggest rival can openly and publicly lampoon the ever loving fuck out of you? 

If there's the astronomically small chance there's a Blizzard employee on a late night caffeine fuelled self hatred induced binge of these reviews who sees this, you absolutely deserve this. You fuckers ruined a great game and have the audacity to defile the remains at our expense. Fuck you, Blizzard.

[h1] Stay away from this game. [/h1] 

After being excited for the upcoming PvE Experience with Skill Tree's and Hero Missions and supporting the game with it's shitty monetization system, I've been lied to the entire time after 8 months of waiting patiently for a washed out PvE Story Mission that costs 15â‚¬, all the time I've spend playing PvP and spending money on it until Season 3 was for nothing. 

Don't waste your money or time on this game, it lies and does not respect you whatsoever. Just look at all the other reviews. 
Play other games that you have more fun with or without friends.
